director Chand and our drew on a wide
selection of Ataturk's diaries and
letters that have been closed to
military archives for decades and never
before seen by the public the film began
showing on October 29th national day in
more than 200 movie theaters around
Turkey but in a country where official
history is kept under lock and key the
film drew a frenzy of angry reactions
from people vowing to boycott it upon
